text:
When Parvati reached her home, she became very sad as she was unable to bear the sorrow of Shiva's separation.
 Sage Narada arrived there.
 Her father Himalaya narrated the whole story to him Sage Narada then gave the five lettered mantra - "OM NAMAH SHIVAJ' to her and he also instructed her to do penance.
 Parvati heart was filled up with new enthusiasm.
title: Narada Preaches Parvati
